title: [Patreon Preview] The Idiom Idiot
itunes:title: [Patreon Preview] The Idiom Idiot
description:
This week, Jim shares his birthday dinner experience at a Frank Sinatra themed restaurant where you need 40 cigarettes to tolerate the food, Forrest reads promos that were written for Jim that could've gotten him canceled, and Jack makes everyone guess the origins of some idioms.

Subscribe at Patreon.com/IDKAT

Tiers start at $2 a month and come with perks ranging from ad-free IDKAT episodes, exclusive After Show episodes, and other bonus content!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
